languages.text: "Один из мудрейших экклезиархов сказал однажды, что все мы играем свои роли, незабвенно служа Императору. Иногда роли меняются, но вера — вера всегда остается" {n}Кассия чуть улыбается.{/n} "Слова Джай часто пестрили сомнительными красками, однако каждое произнесенное слово о Нем сияло белизной веры".

traits.locale_text: "Один из мудрейших экклезиархов сказал однажды, что все мы играем свои роли, незабвенно служа Императору. Иногда роли меняются, но вера — вера всегда остается" {n}Кассия чуть улыбвается.{/n} "Слова Джай часто пестрили сомнительными красками, однако каждое произнесенное слово о Нем сияло белизной веры".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "An Ecclesiarch, one of the wisest, once said that we all play our parts by unfailingly serving the Emperor. Sometimes our parts change, but faith — faith remains." {n}Cassia smiles a little.{/n} "Dubious colours would show up every now and then in things Jae said, but every word she ever spoke of Him shone with the bright white of faith."
languages.original_text: "Один из мудрейших экклезиархов сказал однажды, что все мы играем свои роли, незабвенно служа Императору. Иногда роли меняются, но вера — вера всегда остается" {n}Кассия чуть улыбается.{/n} "Слова Джай часто пестрили сомнительными красками, однако каждое произнесенное слово о Нем сияло белизной веры".

traits.locale_text: "An Ecclesiarch, one of the wisest, once said that we all play our parts by unfailingly serving the Emperor. Sometimes our parts change, but faith — the faith remains." {n}Cassia smiles a little.{/n} "Dubious colours would show up every now and then in things Jae said, but every word she ever spoke of Him shone with the whiteness of faith."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "An Ecclesiarch, one of the wisest, once said that we all play our parts by unfailingly serving the Emperor. Sometimes our parts change, but faith — faith remains." {n}Cassia smiles a little.{/n} "Dubious colours would show up every now and then in things Jae said, but every word she ever spoke of Him shone with the bright white of faith."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “某位无比贤明的教长曾说过，我们每个人都在扮演着我们自己的角色，勤勤恳恳地服侍着帝皇。虽然我们的角色有时会改变，但我们的信仰却始终如一。”{n}卡西娅微微一笑。{/n}“婕伊的话里时不时会散发着可疑的色彩，但只要提及帝皇，她每句话中都闪耀着信仰的亮白色。”
languages.original_text: "An Ecclesiarch, one of the wisest, once said that we all play our parts by unfailingly serving the Emperor. Sometimes our parts change, but faith — faith remains." {n}Cassia smiles a little.{/n} "Dubious colours would show up every now and then in things Jae said, but every word she ever spoke of Him shone with the bright white of faith."

traits.locale_text: “某位无比贤明的教长曾说过，我们每个人都在扮演着我们自己的角色，勤勤恳恳地服侍着帝皇。虽然我们的角色有时会改变，但我们的信仰却始终如一。”{n}卡西娅微微一笑。{/n}“婕伊的话里时不时会散发着可疑的色彩，但只要提及帝皇，她每句话中都闪耀着信仰的亮白色。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "An Ecclesiarch, one of the wisest, once said that we all play our parts by unfailingly serving the Emperor. Sometimes our parts change, but faith — faith remains." {n}Cassia smiles a little.{/n} "Dubious colours would show up every now and then in things Jae said, but every word she ever spoke of Him shone with the bright white of faith."

languages.text: «Uno de los eclesiarcas más sabios dijo que todos tenemos nuestro papel, nuestra forma de servir al Emperador. A veces nuestro papel cambia, pero la fe... la fe es eterna». {n}Cassia sonríe un poco.{/n} «En ocasiones, las palabras de Jae encerraban colores dudosos, pero siempre que habla del Emperador sus palabras resplandecen con el blanco inmaculado de la fe».
languages.original_text: "An Ecclesiarch, one of the wisest, once said that we all play our parts by unfailingly serving the Emperor. Sometimes our parts change, but faith — faith remains." {n}Cassia smiles a little.{/n} "Dubious colours would show up every now and then in things Jae said, but every word she ever spoke of Him shone with the bright white of faith."

traits.locale_text: «Uno de los eclesiarcas más sabios dijo que todos tenemos nuestro papel, nuestra forma de servir al Emperador. A veces nuestro papel cambia, pero la fe... la fe es eterna». {n}Cassia sonríe un poco.{/n} «En ocasiones, las palabras de Jae encerraban colores dudosos, pero siempre que habla del Emperador sus palabras resplandecen con el blanco inmaculado de la fe».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「最も賢き人の一人であるエクレシアークはかつて、私たちは皆、皇帝に揺るぎなく仕えることで自分の役割を果たすのだと言いました。時には役割が変わっても…信念は、信仰は変わらないのだと」{n}カシアはかすかに微笑む。{/n}「ジェイの言葉には時折怪しげな色彩が現れますが、彼女が皇帝について語る言葉はすべて、信仰の真っ白な輝きを放っていました」
languages.original_text: "An Ecclesiarch, one of the wisest, once said that we all play our parts by unfailingly serving the Emperor. Sometimes our parts change, but faith — faith remains." {n}Cassia smiles a little.{/n} "Dubious colours would show up every now and then in things Jae said, but every word she ever spoke of Him shone with the bright white of faith."

traits.locale_text: 「最も賢き人の一人であるエクレシアークはかつて、私たちは皆、皇帝に揺るぎなく仕えることで自分の役割を果たすのだと言いました。時には役割が変わっても…信念は、信仰は変わらないのだと」{n}カシアはかすかに微笑む。{/n}「ジェイの言葉には時折怪しげな色彩が現れますが、彼女が皇帝について語る言葉はすべて、信仰の真っ白な輝きを放っていました」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ein Ekklesiarch, einer der weisesten, hat einmal gesagt, dass wir alle unsere Rolle spielen, indem wir dem Imperator unermüdlich dienen. Manchmal ändern unsere Rollen sich, doch der Glaube — der Glaube bleibt." {n}Cassia lächelt leicht.{/n} "Hin und wieder erschienen in Dingen, die Jae sagte, dubiose Farben auf. Doch jedes Wort, das sie über ihn aussprach, strahlte das leuchtende Weiß reinen Glaubens aus."
languages.original_text: "An Ecclesiarch, one of the wisest, once said that we all play our parts by unfailingly serving the Emperor. Sometimes our parts change, but faith — faith remains." {n}Cassia smiles a little.{/n} "Dubious colours would show up every now and then in things Jae said, but every word she ever spoke of Him shone with the bright white of faith."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Ekklesiarch, einer der weisesten, hat einmal gesagt, dass wir alle unsere Rolle spielen, indem wir dem Imperator unermüdlich dienen. Manchmal ändern unsere Rollen sich, doch der Glaube — der Glaube bleibt." {n}Cassia lächelt leicht.{/n} "Hin und wieder erschienen in Dingen, die Jae sagte, dubiose Farben auf. Doch jedes Wort, das sie über ihn aussprach, strahlte das leuchtende Weiß reinen Glaubens aus."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Un ecclésiarque, l'un des plus sages, a dit un jour que nous avons tous un rôle à jouer au service de l'Empereur. Parfois, ce rôle change, mais la foi, elle, demeure, {n}déclare Cassia en se permettant un petit sourire.{/n} Je ne nierai pas que Jae est parfois entourée de couleurs douteuses lorsqu'elle parle, mais chaque fois qu'elle mentionne l'Empereur, ses paroles rayonnent du blanc étincelant de la foi. »
languages.original_text: "An Ecclesiarch, one of the wisest, once said that we all play our parts by unfailingly serving the Emperor. Sometimes our parts change, but faith — faith remains." {n}Cassia smiles a little.{/n} "Dubious colours would show up every now and then in things Jae said, but every word she ever spoke of Him shone with the bright white of faith."

traits.locale_text: « Un ecclésiarque, l'un des plus sages, a dit un jour que nous avons tous un rôle à jouer au service de l'Empereur. Parfois, ce rôle change, mais la foi, elle, demeure, {n}déclare Cassia en se permettant un petit sourire.{/n} Je ne nierai pas que Jae est parfois entourée de couleurs douteuses lorsqu'elle parle, mais chaque fois qu'elle mentionne l'Empereur, ses paroles rayonnent du blanc étincelant de la foi. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "En bilge Ekleşiarklardan biri, bir keresinde İmparator'a sadık kalıp hizmet ederek hepimizin üstümüze düşen görevi yerine getirdiğini söylemişti. Bazen insan değişse de inancı baki kalır." {n}Cassia hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Arada sırada Jae'ın söylediklerinden ne idiği belirsiz renkler görünse de... İmparator'dan bahsederken ağzından çıkan her kelimede inancın ak ışıltısı parıldıyor."
languages.original_text: "An Ecclesiarch, one of the wisest, once said that we all play our parts by unfailingly serving the Emperor. Sometimes our parts change, but faith — faith remains." {n}Cassia smiles a little.{/n} "Dubious colours would show up every now and then in things Jae said, but every word she ever spoke of Him shone with the bright white of faith."

traits.locale_text: "En bilge Ekleşiarklardan biri, bir keresinde İmparator'a sadık kalıp hizmet ederek hepimizin üstümüze düşen görevi yerine getirdiğini söylemişti. Bazen insan değişse de inancı baki kalır." {n}Cassia hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Arada sırada Jae'ın söylediklerinden ne idiği belirsiz renkler görünse de, İmparator'dan bahsederken ağzından çıkan her kelimede inancın ak ışıltısı parıldıyordu."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
